justification: The Offering explicitly states Power BI 'transforms raw data into interactive and visually immersive insights,' supporting data-driven decision-making. The Interfaces claim broad data source support, enhancing utility for diverse users. However, there is no direct mention of real-time decision-making capabilities or explicit business-user focus in the visual interface as required. The response is strong but lacks some specificity around real-time and tailored user experiences.
ability: The ability to analyze stored data (records) to derive insights and actions in a business user focused visual interface
